delete

public void delete(Gadget gadget)
Description copied from interface: GadgetView
Deletes the gadget matching the one specified. If it is not found in the document, then this method has no effect.

Specified by:
delete in interface GadgetView
Parameters:
gadget - The gadget to be deleted.

delete

public void delete(java.lang.String url)
Description copied from interface: GadgetView
Searches the document for a gadget matching the given url. If found, it is deleted, otherwise this method has no effect.

Specified by:
delete in interface GadgetView
Parameters:
url - the url of the gadget to be deleted.

public Gadget getGadget(java.lang.String url)
Description copied from interface: GadgetView
Returns the gadget matching the specified url. If no gadget is found, null is returned.

Specified by:
getGadget in interface GadgetView
Parameters:
url - the url of the gadget to be matched.
Returns:
the gadget if found, null otherwise.

insertAfter

public void insertAfter(Gadget after,
                        Gadget gadget)
Description copied from interface: GadgetView
Inserts a new gadget immediately after the given gadget's position in the document. If the 'after' gadget is not found, this method has no effect.

Specified by:
insertAfter in interface GadgetView
Parameters:
after - the gadget after which the new gadget is to be inserted.
gadget - the new gadget to be inserted.

insertAfter in interface GadgetView
Parameters:
url - the url of the gadget to be found.
gadget - the new gadget to be inserted.

replace

public void replace(Gadget gadget)
Description copied from interface: GadgetView
Replaces the contents of the gadget matching the given gadget's url with the contents of the given gadget. If a gadget matching this url is not found, this method has no effect.

Specified by:
replace in interface GadgetView
Parameters:
gadget - the gadget to be found and replaced.

replace

public void replace(Gadget toReplace,
                    Gadget replaceWith)
Description copied from interface: GadgetView
Replaces the 'toReplace' gadget with the 'replaceWith' gadget. If the 'toReplace' gadget cannot be found, this method has no effect.

Specified by:
replace in interface GadgetView
Parameters:
toReplace - the gadget to be replaced.
replaceWith - the replacement gadget.

replace

public void replace(java.lang.String url,
                    Gadget gadget)
Description copied from interface: GadgetView
Replaces the gadget matching the given url with the given gadget. If the gadget cannot be found, this method has no effect.

Specified by:
replace in interface GadgetView
Parameters:
url - the url of the gadget to be replaced.
gadget - the replacement gadget.
